package.name: fipa_acl
package.description: FIPA (Foundation for Intelligent Physical Agents) provides a specification for an agent communication language. This is a C++ implementation of a message parser and a message generator. Since FIPA also define interaction protocols, i.e. agents can use a well defined sequence of message to talk to each other. This library contains a conversation monitor that uses a state machine to validate message flows to conform to a protocol. Protocols can be defined in statechart xml format.
